title: adprava
subtitle: A beginner's ReactJS project containing 6 pages and navigation.
body: Adprava is a practice project that deals with some concepts of ReactJS and NodeJS. This project is built solely with the purpose of learning Web Development, and is being shared with other developers in github for reviews, practice, help to begginers etc reasons.

title: widget-app
subtitle: Widget App is a very simple practice app of React Hooks systems. The app will contain four widgets, namely a Search, Accordion, Dropdown, and a Translate widget. The widgets will be accessible from the nav bar. This is a application practice of ReactJS hooks system and functional programming.
body: Widget App is a very simple practice app of React Hooks systems. The app will contain four widgets, namely a Search, Accordion, Dropdown, and a Translate widget. The widgets will be accessible from the nav bar. This is a application practice of ReactJS hooks system and functional programming.

title: tasker-in-react
subtitle: A lab project for practicing handling forms in reactjs and react states.
body: A lab project for practicing handling forms in reactjs and react states.

title: vids-fetching-app
subtitle: vids-fetching-app is essentially an app to fetch videos from a web API according to the user's query. Then the app is responsible for showing a list of recommended videos, and a video player. Use the app in your React Development to avoid YouTube ads
body: vids-fetching-app is essentially an app to fetch videos from a web API according to the user's query. Then the app is responsible for showing a list of recommended videos, and a video player. Use the app in your React Development to avoid YouTube ads

title: pics-fetching-app
subtitle: Pics Fetching App is a simple web app using reactjs, which has a input field to take user input, and the app returns images that matches the input quired by the user. It is a application practice of Fetching Data, API, Handling User Input in React JS
body: Pics Fetching App is a simple web app using reactjs, which has a input field to take user input, and the app returns images that matches the input quired by the user. It is a application practice of Fetching Data, API, Handling User Input in React JS

title: ulbumy
subtitle: A project for creating photo albums under different users for learning/practicing API with async thunks.
body: A project for creating photo albums under different users for learning/practicing API with async thunks.
